name: WITHOUT (Fejeje)
description:
Without is the tale of four kids who venture on a journey to save the world from... themselves? Discover the meaning of loss, redemption, and human nature in WITHOUT: The Bee Game. 

Without is a turn-based RPG that takes inspiration from the likes of the Mother, Undertale, and Persona franchises! In this game you take control of bugs and get to explore a world full of a vast variety of backyard critters! Although you may be fighting pests there are great stakes on the line! Using their connection to nature, four kids take the form of these bugs to try and negotiate with a vengeful earth spirit. Why? Find out by playing WITHOUT: The Bee Game!    

(During your playthrough of the demo version you'll get to meet numerous characters and get a brief glimpse of the world you seem to have randomly awoken in. )
